info.title: getmemoryinfo example
info.description: This is an API example for getmemoryinfo, a method to get detailed information about the node's memory  usage.

items.description: The mode in which memory information should be returned. 'stats' for a summary view,  'mallocinfo' for detailed XML format.

200.description: Detailed information about the node's memory usage.

result.description: Memory information in the requested format.
